channel.title: Netgear problems
channel.description: I doubt anyone can help, but it's worth a try. i've had so many people try help but no one works with netgears, is it possible for me to have my own server if i'm using netgear? i can get on my server and stuff edit etc.. but can't let anyone on, once i type i.p address and do user and pass etc. it brings up netgear, people keep saying click allow gaming application and stuff, but i don't have it there, if there anyone out their that knows how to fix this?.

item.title: Netgear problems
item.dc:creator: @basics basics
item.description:
@basics wrote:

I use netgear too. I believe you can.

Read full topic

item.title: Netgear problems
item.dc:creator: @njr99 njr99
item.description:
@njr99 wrote:

go to www.portforward.com and follow that. select your router model
and when you select the type of client/game/server look for something like virtual server or something with moparscape

Read full topic

item.title: Netgear problems
item.dc:creator: @i_bl33d_i i bl33d i
item.description:
@i_bl33d_i wrote:

I doubt anyone can help, but it’s worth a try. i’ve had so many people try help but no one works with netgears, is it possible for me to have my own server if i’m using netgear? i can get on my server and stuff edit etc… but can’t let anyone on, once i type i.p address and do user and pass etc. it brings up netgear, people keep saying click allow gaming application and stuff, but i don’t have it there, if there anyone out their that knows how to fix this?.
